content.question: A researcher wants to explore whether a new treatment for muscular sclerosis is effective. What is the best way to ensure that results of a study are generalizable to a population?

choices.label: By making sure to use as many participants as possible
By making sure the results are significant
By using a random selection of people in that population

content.answer: By using a random selection of people in that population

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
